anki-set-randomizer FRONT

4.03. Second randomization
Let's have the same question, as before, but show the answer in-place:
Example: Connect countries with their respective capitals:
Countries: [[$n!()::$o(a)::Italy::Ethiopia::India::New Zealand::Germany]]
Capitals: [[$o(a))::Rome::Addis Ababa::New Delhi::Wellington::Berlin]]
Or in list view:
[[$n!(y)::$o(b, y)::Italy]]: [[$n(z)::$o(b, z)::Rome]]
[[$n(y)::Ethiopia]]: [[$n(z)::Addis Ababa]]
[[$n(y)::India]]: [[$n(z)::New Delhi]]
[[$n(y)::New Zealand]]: [[$n(z)::Wellington]]
[[$n(y)::Germany]]: [[$n(z)::Berlin]]


Go to back!
Go to options!
